content.content:
commit 220a607d720605efa47f91b110e5981f0ee9218e
Author: Jesse Ikawa <208710618+jikawa-dd@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Fri Aug 8 09:41:52 2025 -0700

    DDAIR-138: Add drone authentication (#91087)
    
    - Get a map of all vault secrets in air-fleet-service that start with prefix "DRONE_SECRET"
    - Check drone-auth header in api requests against drone secrets map
    - For the scope of this pr, drone secrets are not tied to individuals drones, each secret is anonymous for each drone. Associating drones to their secret key may be done in the future per database modification.
    - We can invalidate compromised secrets by removing secrets from the vault
    
    **Sandbox Testing**
    *Valid drone-auth token*
    Request:
    ```
    grpcurl -plaintext -H "drone-auth: testsecret" -d '{
      "battery": {
        "battery_percentage": "85"
      },
      "location": {
        "latitude": 37.7749,
        "longitude": -122.4194,
        "altitude": 100.5,
        "heading": 270.0,
        "ground_speed": 15.2
      },
      "mission_state": "IN_FLIGHT"
    }' localhost:50051 air_fleet_service.v1.DroneCommsService.ReportDroneTelemetry
    ```
    Response:
    ```
    {}
    ```
    Telemetry Request Log:
    ```
    {
      "@timestamp": "2025-08-06T21:53:13.395605234Z",
      "message": "[reportDroneTelemetry] is called",
      "logger_name": "com.doordash.airfleetservice.grpc.DroneCommsServiceImpl",
      "level": "INFO",
      "request": "battery {\n  battery_percentage {\n    value: 85\n  }\n}\nlocation {\n  latitude: 37.7749\n  longitude: -122.4194\n  altitude {\n    value: 100.5\n  }\n  heading {\n    value: 270.0\n  }\n  ground_speed {\n    value: 15.2\n  }\n}\nmission_state {\n  value: \"IN_FLIGHT\"\n}\n"
    }
    ```
    *No drone-auth token*
    Request:
    ```
    grpcurl -plaintext -d '{
    ```
    ```
      "battery": {
        "battery_percentage": "85"
      },
      "location": {
        "latitude": 37.7749,
        "longitude": -122.4194,
        "altitude": 100.5,
        "heading": 270.0,
        "ground_speed": 15.2
    ```

1package com.doordash.airfleetservice.interceptor
     2
     3import com.doordash.airfleetservice.service.DroneAuthService
     4import com.doordash.logging.KontextLogger
     5import com.google.inject.Inject
     6import com.google.inject.Singleton
     7import io.grpc.Context
     8import io.grpc.Contexts
     9import io.grpc.Metadata
    10import io.grpc.ServerCall
    11import io.grpc.ServerCallHandler
    12import io.grpc.ServerInterceptor
    13import io.grpc.Status
    14
    15@Singleton
    16class DroneAuthInterceptor @Inject constructor(
    17    private val droneAuthService: DroneAuthService
    18) : ServerInterceptor {
    19
    20    private val logger = KontextLogger.logger { }
    21
    22    companion object {
    23        val DRONE_AUTH_HEADER: Metadata.Key<String> =
    24            Metadata.Key.of("drone-auth", Metadata.ASCII_STRING_MARSHALLER)
    25    }
    26
    27    override fun <ReqT : Any?, RespT : Any?> interceptCall(
    28        call: ServerCall<ReqT, RespT>,
    29        headers: Metadata,
    30        next: ServerCallHandler<ReqT, RespT>
    31    ): ServerCall.Listener<ReqT> {
    32        try {
    33            val droneAuthToken = headers.get(DRONE_AUTH_HEADER)
    34            val grpcMethod = call.methodDescriptor.bareMethodName ?: "unknown"
    35
    36            val authResult = droneAuthService.authenticate(droneAuthToken, grpcMethod)
    37
    38            if (authResult.secretKeyUsed != null) {
    39                return Contexts.interceptCall(Context.current(), call, headers, next)
    40            } else {
    41                throw Status.UNAUTHENTICATED
    42                    .withDescription("Invalid drone authentication")
    43                    .asRuntimeException()
    44            }
    45        } catch (e: Exception) {
    46            logger.withValues(
    47                "exceptionType" to e.javaClass.simpleName,
    48                "message" to e.message
    49            ).error("[DroneAuthInterceptor] Error in drone authentication")
    50            throw Status.UNAUTHENTICATED
    51                .withDescription("Authentication failed")
    52                .asRuntimeException()
    53        }
    54    }
    55}
    56

1package com.doordash.airfleetservice.service
     2
     3import com.doordash.airfleetservice.config.DroneAuthConfig
     4import com.doordash.logging.KontextLogger
     5import com.google.inject.Inject
     6import com.google.inject.Singleton
     7
     8@Singleton
     9class DroneAuthService @Inject constructor(
    10    private val droneAuthConfig: DroneAuthConfig
    11) {
    12    private val logger = KontextLogger.logger { }
    13
    14    data class DroneAuthResult(
    15        val secretKeyUsed: String? = null
    16    )
    17
    18    fun authenticate(droneAuthToken: String?, methodName: String): DroneAuthResult {
    19        try {
    20            val secretMapping = droneAuthConfig.getDroneSecretMapping()
    21
    22            val secretKeyUsed = secretMapping.entries
    23                .find { it.value == droneAuthToken }
    24                ?.key
    25
    26            if (secretKeyUsed == null) {
    27                logger.withValues(
    28                    METHOD_KEY to methodName,
    29                    VALIDATION_RESULT_KEY to "INVALID_TOKEN"
    30                ).warn("[DroneAuthService] Invalid drone authentication token")
    31                return DroneAuthResult()
    32            }
    33
    34            logger.withValues(
    35                METHOD_KEY to methodName,
    36                "secret_key" to secretKeyUsed,
    37                VALIDATION_RESULT_KEY to "SUCCESS"
    38            ).info("[DroneAuthService] Drone authenticated successfully")
    39
    40            return DroneAuthResult(secretKeyUsed = secretKeyUsed)
    41        } catch (e: Exception) {
    42            logger.withValues(
    43                METHOD_KEY to methodName,
    44                "exceptionType" to e.javaClass.simpleName,
    45                "message" to e.message
    46            ).error("[DroneAuthService] Unexpected error during drone authentication", e)
    47            return DroneAuthResult()
    48        }
    49    }
    50
    51    companion object {
    52        private const val METHOD_KEY = "method"
    53        private const val VALIDATION_RESULT_KEY = "validation_result"
    54    }
    55}
    56

1package com.doordash.payin.common.utils
     2
     3import com.doordash.payin.common.json.gson
     4import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationContextEvent
     5import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationEventSource
     6import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationEventType
     7import com.doordash.payin.common.producer.ValidationContextEventProducer
     8import com.google.common.hash.Hashing
     9import com.google.inject.Inject
    10import com.google.inject.Singleton
    11import io.opentelemetry.api.trace.Span
    12import io.opentelemetry.context.Context
    13import io.opentelemetry.context.ContextKey
    14import java.time.Instant
    15
    16@Singleton
    17class ValidationFrameworkUtils @Inject constructor(
    18    private val producer: ValidationContextEventProducer,
    19) {
    20    fun <R> withValidation(
    21        functionName: String,
    22        eventType: ValidationEventType,
    23        args: Map<String, Any?>,
    24        block: () -> R,
    25    ): R {
    26        // Pre-process
    27        val traceId = Span.current().spanContext.takeIf { it.isValid }?.traceId
    28        val isValidationEnabled = Context.current().get(VALIDATION_CAPTURE_ENABLED_KEY) ?: false
    29        val shouldRecord = traceId != null && isValidationEnabled
    30        val timestamp = Instant.now()
    31
    32        val result = runCatching(block)
    33
    34        if (shouldRecord) {
    35            val requestJson = runCatching { gson.toJson(args) }.getOrElse { "{}" }
    36            val responseJson = result.fold(
    37                onSuccess = { runCatching { gson.toJson(it) }.getOrElse { "{}" } },
    38                onFailure = { runCatching { gson.toJson(it) }.getOrElse { "{}" } },
    39            )
    40            val event = ValidationContextEvent(
    41                traceId = traceId!!,
    42                functionName = functionName,
    43                timestamp = timestamp,
    44                eventType = eventType,
    45                sourceService = ValidationEventSource.PAYIN_PLATFORM,
    46                requestPayload = requestJson,
    47                responsePayload = responseJson,
    48            )
    49            producer.publish(event)
    50        }
    51        return result.getOrThrow()
    52    }
    53
    54    suspend fun <R> withValidationSuspend(
    55        functionName: String,
    56        eventType: ValidationEventType,
    57        args: Map<String, Any?>,
    58        block: suspend () -> R,
    59    ): R {
    60        // Pre-process
    61        val traceId = Span.current().spanContext.takeIf { it.isValid }?.traceId
    62        val isValidationEnabled = Context.current().get(VALIDATION_CAPTURE_ENABLED_KEY) ?: false
    63        val shouldRecord = traceId != null && isValidationEnabled
    64        val timestamp = Instant.now()
    65
    66        val result = runCatching { block() }
    67
    68        if (shouldRecord) {
    69            val requestJson = runCatching { gson.toJson(args) }.getOrElse { "{}" }
    70            val responseJson = result.fold(
    71                onSuccess = { runCatching { gson.toJson(it) }.getOrElse { "{}" } },
    72                onFailure = { runCatching { gson.toJson(it) }.getOrElse { "{}" } },
    73            )
    74            val event = ValidationContextEvent(
    75                traceId = traceId!!,
    76                functionName = functionName,
    77                timestamp = timestamp,
    78                eventType = eventType,
    79                sourceService = ValidationEventSource.PAYIN_PLATFORM,
    80                requestPayload = requestJson,
    81                responsePayload = responseJson,
    82            )
    83            producer.publish(event)
    84        }
    85        return result.getOrThrow()
    86    }
    87
    88    fun emitLabel(label: String) {
    89        val traceId = Span.current().spanContext.takeIf { it.isValid }?.traceId
    90        val isValidationEnabled = Context.current().get(VALIDATION_CAPTURE_ENABLED_KEY) ?: false
    91        val shouldRecord = traceId != null && isValidationEnabled
    92
    93        if (shouldRecord) {
    94            val event = ValidationContextEvent(
    95                traceId = traceId!!,
    96                functionName = label,
    97                timestamp = Instant.now(),
    98                eventType = ValidationEventType.LABEL,
    99                sourceService = ValidationEventSource.PAYIN_PLATFORM,
   100                requestPayload = "",
   101                responsePayload = "",
   102            )
   103            producer.publish(event)
   104        }
   105    }
   106
   107    companion object {
   108        private const val MASK_VALUE = 0x7FFFFFFF // Mask to ensure positive hash values
   109        val VALIDATION_CAPTURE_ENABLED_KEY: ContextKey<Boolean> = ContextKey.named("validation-capture-enabled")
   110
   111        fun shouldSample(samplingRate: Double, traceId: String): Boolean {
   112            if (samplingRate <= 0.0) return false
   113            if (samplingRate >= 1.0) return true
   114
   115            // Murmur3 provides better hash distribution than the hashCode function while having a similar performance.
   116            val hash = Hashing.murmur3_32_fixed().hashString(traceId, Charsets.UTF_8).asInt()
   117            val normalized = (hash and MASK_VALUE) / Int.MAX_VALUE.toDouble()
   118
   119            return normalized < samplingRate
   120        }
   121    }
   122}
   123

package com.doordash.airfleetservice.interceptor

import com.doordash.airfleetservice.service.DroneAuthService
import io.grpc.Metadata
import io.grpc.MethodDescriptor
import io.grpc.ServerCall
import io.grpc.ServerCallHandler
import io.grpc.Status
import org.junit.Assert.assertEquals
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
import org.junit.jupiter.api.assertThrows
import org.mockito.kotlin.any
import org.mockito.kotlin.mock
import org.mockito.kotlin.verify
import org.mockito.kotlin.whenever

class DroneAuthInterceptorTest {

    private lateinit var mockDroneAuthService: DroneAuthService
    private lateinit var droneAuthInterceptor: DroneAuthInterceptor
    private lateinit var mockCall: ServerCall<Any, Any>
    private lateinit var mockNext: ServerCallHandler<Any, Any>
    private lateinit var mockMethodDescriptor: MethodDescriptor<Any, Any>
    private lateinit var headers: Metadata

    companion object {
        private const val VALID_TOKEN = "valid-token"
        private const val SECRET_KEY = "DRONE_SECRET_001"
        private const val TEST_METHOD = "TestMethod"
    }

    @BeforeEach
    fun setUp() {
        mockDroneAuthService = mock()
        droneAuthInterceptor = DroneAuthInterceptor(mockDroneAuthService)
        mockCall = mock()
        mockNext = mock()
        mockMethodDescriptor = mock()
        headers = Metadata()

        whenever(mockCall.methodDescriptor).thenReturn(mockMethodDescriptor)
        whenever(mockMethodDescriptor.bareMethodName).thenReturn(TEST_METHOD)
    }

    @Test
    fun `TEST interceptCall succeeds with valid authentication`() {
        headers.put(DroneAuthInterceptor.DRONE_AUTH_HEADER, VALID_TOKEN)
        val authResult = DroneAuthService.DroneAuthResult(secretKeyUsed = SECRET_KEY)
        whenever(mockDroneAuthService.authenticate(any(), any())).thenReturn(authResult)

package com.doordash.payin.common.utils

import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationContextEvent
import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationEventSource
import com.doordash.payin.common.model.common.ValidationEventType
import com.doordash.payin.common.producer.ValidationContextEventProducer
import com.doordash.payin.common.utils.ValidationFrameworkUtils.Companion.shouldSample
import io.kotest.assertions.throwables.shouldNotThrowAny
import io.kotest.assertions.throwables.shouldThrow
import io.kotest.matchers.shouldBe
import io.mockk.every
import io.mockk.mockk
import io.mockk.mockkStatic
import io.mockk.slot
import io.mockk.unmockkStatic
import io.mockk.verify
import io.opentelemetry.api.trace.Span
import io.opentelemetry.api.trace.SpanContext
import io.opentelemetry.context.Context
import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Nested
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
import org.junit.jupiter.api.parallel.Isolated
import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest
import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ValueSource

@Isolated
class ValidationFrameworkUtilsTest {
    private val traceId = "abc123def456"

    @Nested
    inner class TestShouldSample {
        @Test
        fun `shouldSample returns false when sampling rate is zero`() {
            val result = shouldSample(0.0, traceId)
            result shouldBe false
        }

        @Test
        fun `shouldSample returns false when sampling rate is negative`() {
            val result = shouldSample(-1.0, traceId)
            result shouldBe false
        }

        @Test
        fun `shouldSample returns true when sampling rate is 1_0`() {
            val result = shouldSample(1.0, traceId)
            result shouldBe true
        }
